When a parent is taking care of an infant they will be very cautious about the child’s safety and health. To keep their infant healthy parents make sure that their little one is clean. To clean a baby’s ear cotton buds are used. The Tollyjoy Cotton Buds are made of surgical grade cotton that is safe on an infant’s delicate skin. These soft and gentle Cotton Swabs from Tollyjoy can also be used to dry your bundle of joy’s fragile skin over the navel. The highly absorbent Cotton Buds will easily soak up the extra moisture and leave the little angel dry and free of infections.

When you try to clean your tiny tot’s ear or nose make sure that you do not insert the cotton bud too deep as this can lead to injuries. Only visible wax and dirt should be removed from an infant’s ears. The cotton buds should be kept away from your children’s reach so that they do not use them on their ears without your supervision. You can use these Tollyjoy Cotton Buds to apply and remove make-up as well.

Tollyjoy Baby Nail Clipper Price: Rs.145

Parents are always extra cautious when it comes to their children’s cleanliness. No spot on an infant’s body is left unclean in order to make sure that they are free from infections and illnesses. Children’s nails grow very quickly and they might also accumulate a lot of dirt in them. Hence the baby’s nails have to be trimmed regularly to prevent the little ones falling ill. Long nails on an infant’s finger can even injure the child at times. The Tollyjoy Nail Clipper has been intricately designed to fit the parent’s hands perfectly so that they can have a strong grip on the clipper. This will enable the parent to safely and accurately clip the nails from their bundle of joy’s hands and feet.

This Nail Clipper from Tollyjoy has a special holder to collect the cut nails and thus prevent the nails from being strewn all over. The file on the Tollyjoy Nail Clipper allows you to buff the nails and smooth the edges. Trimming your tiny tot’s nails when they sleep will give you better control over paring the nail as the asleep child will not show resistance.
